amendment.description: To increase by $360,800,000 the amount of supplemental appropriations for Other Procurement, Army, for the procurement of armored Tactical Wheeled Vehicles for units deployed in Iraq and Afghanistan or for other Army priorities, and to provide an offset.

action.text: Amendment SA 2464 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2464 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
